title: Blitzcrank's Poro Roundup Freezes When Jinx Spawns in Piltover
body:
Title.

Froze when Jinx appears. No, the game wasn't paused on accident. Legit freeze.

replies.body: What phone/hardware are you running the game on?

A 4 year-old Gateway FX 

Specs: 
Intel Core i7 processor 930
ATI Radeon HD 5850 1024MB (all drivers automatically up to date via Catalyst auto-update)
9GB DDR3 Memory

Windows 7 Home (updated)
Google Chrome for Browser (updated)

---

I just clicked to play the game directly from the LOL client. It opened it in Chrome. I beat the Singed boss just fine then fought the poros in Piltover. I didn't see any noticeable delay or anything wrong at this point. As soon as Jinx landed on the road it froze and the music started doing a half second infinite loop.  I couldn't click anything in the game. I tried pausing and unpausing. No reaction to my mouse. However Chrome did close when I clicked the red X on the top right of the browser. No issues there, meaning it was just the game that froze.  

Headed to bed right now and will answer any more questions tomorrow. Thank you! The Singed fight was pretty fun ^_^

> 9TB DDR3 Memory

Wait, what? Do you mean 9GB DDR3 Memory or 9TB HDD Space?
Game freezes with some of the other bosses too, i just reload and redo the level. but i do cringe every time i beat the level but it freezes. especially in Shurima.
